## Plum Island Ecossytem LTER Fiddler Crabs 
```{r}
#Load libraries 

library(lterdatasampler)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

This is a plot of fiddler crab sizes by latitude. 
```{r}
#| fig-cap: "fiddler crab sizes"
pie_crab <- pie_crab

crab_plot <- ggplot(data = pie_crab, 
       aes(x = size, 
           y = latitude)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  coord_flip() 

crab_plot
```
THis is a summary table of fidler crab sizes based on site. 
```{r}
#Summary table 

library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)

summary_table <- pie_crab |> 
  group_by(site) |>
  summarize(mean_size = round(mean(size, na.rm = TRUE),2), 
            sd_size = sd(size, na.rm = TRUE),
            sample_size = n()) %>% 
  kable(col.names = c("Site", "Size Mean (mm)", "Size Sd (mm)", "Size Sample Size"))

summary_table
```
